Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
10 Reckless 7 Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
25 Heatproof 6 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
40 Shed Skin 8 The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
55 Anger Shell 5 When HP drops to half or less, defenses are lowered but attack and Speed are raised.
70 Overcoat 7 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
85 Marvel Scale 5 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
100 Sheer Force 9 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 2 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 02 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 20 Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 33 Strong Jaw 7 The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
Disc 41 Limber 4 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Anger Point 7 The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
Berserk 6 Boosts its Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Competitive 7 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Dragon's Maw 4 Powers up Dragon-type moves.
Gluttony 3 Makes the Pokémon already eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
Heatproof 6 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Marvel Scale 5 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Moxie 7 The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
Multiscale 8 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Primalize 8 Normal-type moves become Dragon-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Reckless 7 Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
Sheer Force 9 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stamina 7 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Anger Shell 5 When HP drops to half or less, defenses are lowered but attack and Speed are raised.
Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Overcoat 7 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
Shed Skin 8 The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
Shell Armor 2 A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Thick Fat 7 A layer of thick fat halves the damage the Pokémon takes from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
